Key Match Events: The first ODI ended in a tie
Pre-Game Insights: The pitch at the R Premadasa Stadium was challenging with early swing and seam movement.
Sri Lanka's spin attack performed well, restricting India's total.
Pathum Nissanka and Dunith Wellalage scored fifties for Sri Lanka.
Rohit Sharma scored a quick-fire fifty for India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series is alive after the first ODI tie.
India and Sri Lanka have enough quality to compete in the next matches.
